title: Hour 3 – Charles Robinson (07-07-20)
itunes:title: Hour 3 – Charles Robinson (07-07-20)
description:
FOX Sports Radio hosts Jason Smith and Doug Gottlieb are in for Dan and the Danettes, and Jason explains to Doug why he thinks Andy Reid will go down as one of the greatest coaches of all time after QB Patrick Mahomes signs a massive new contract extension. NFL Insider Charles Robinson joins the show to discuss DeSean Jackson’s anti-Semitic social media posts and how the Eagles will handle the situation. They also talk about Dwight Howard opting in and Bradley Beal opting out of playing in the NBA’s bubble.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
